      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Event EventManager.getCurrentUserEventById(int id)
      Similar to "getEventById" but also checks if the organizer of the event is the current user

      Query that gets an event by its ID
      Methods in it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control that return types with arguments of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Event> EventManager.getEventsByDate(Date date)
      Query to get all the events at the given date for the current user
      List<Event> EventManager.getEventsForBadWeatherAlerts()
      Query to get all the events for bad weather alerts: finds all outdoor events in the current user's calendar that take place tomorrow
      Methods in it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean EventManager.canCurrentUserAlterEvent(Event event)
      Checks if the current user can alter (update or delete) the given event
      void EventManager.delete(Event event)
      Method to delete an event from the database, together with all its notifications
      boolean EventManager.isEventOrganizedByCurrentUser(Event event)
      Checks if the current user is the organizer of the given event
      String CalendarManager.requestWeatherForecast(Event event)
      Method to retrieve the weather forecast for the given event via HTTP Request
      void EventManager.save(Event event)
      Method to save the event in the database
      void EventManager.saveBadWeatherAlertSent(Event event)
      Method to update a persisted Event entity setting the boolean "badWeatherAlertSent" to true
      void EventManager.saveWeatherForecast(String forecast, Event event)
      Method to update a persisted Event entity with a weather forecast
      void EventManager.sendInvitations(Event event, Set<User> invitedUsersList)
      Sends invitations regarding the given event to the given users
      Notification NotificationManager.sendNotification(String title, String content, boolean invitation, User receiver, Event linkedEvent)
      Sends a notification to the desired user, with the given parameters
      void EventManager.update(Event event)
      Method to update an event already in the database
